segments.text: Mr . Lin , what are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I'm not much of an outdoor person . What do you like about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love the fresh air , the scenery the exercise , and the time to think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you hike or fish on your trips ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , both . Last trip I fished a little and hiked five miles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I threw them back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about Joining our summer camp next week ?
segments.speaker: S1
